login.title: Welcome to the Real Estate Sample App
login.paragraph: This app was designed to showcase the potential integration of the Docusign Rooms API into a RealEstate CRM. This application is open-source and all of the code is located in our GitHub repository.

info.title: Login info
info.paragraph1: The action demonstrates the login feature:
info.listItem1: Obtain a JWT (JSON Web Token) for use in future API calls
info.listItem2: Obtain the Docusign Rooms account info necessary for future API calls
info.listItem3Part1: (optional) Adds the user to a unique
info.step1info2: with the correct permissions required by the application. This application employs rooms read and write permissions along with company read and write permissions
info.step2info1: Obtain the user's Room userId information using the Rooms
info.step3info1: This application has every user logged in to the same account in order to simplify the sample application. In order to do so, every user is assigned a unique officeId which is stored in local storage. If the user has not logged in before or has cleared his/her local storage, a new office is created using the method
info.step3info3: and the user is added to this office using the method

info.title: Get Rooms Info
info.paragraph1: This page demonstrates how to get all the rooms associated with an office as well as how to get all the field info of a specific room.

info.title: Get/Edit Room Info
info.paragraph1: This page demonstrates how to get the field data for a Room and how to modify this data via the Rooms API.
info.listItem1: Get the data for a room using its roomId (an integer number unique to each room).
info.listItem2: Update any of the field data for that Room.
info.step1info1: The field data for a specific room can be obtained via the
info.step1info3: API endpoint with the roomId of the specified room.
